response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. This exceptional item holds significant value for me, and I believe it would be equally beneficial for you. Given its worth to both of us, I propose a transaction price of $12,000. This amount reflects a fair compromise between its intrinsic value and your perceived worth, aiming to ensure mutual satisfaction. I look forward to your positive response and the possibility of a successful collaboration.", "product_price": 12000}
